languages.text: Гостям предлагаются лучшие яства, какими может похвастаться колония. Архикоролева на искаженном за века изоляции низком готике славит гостей и называет Лорд-капитана любезн{mf|ым братом|ой сестрой}. В конце аудиенции гостям преподносят подарки. Министр Архикоролевы осторожно намекает, что лучшим ответным подарком было бы пополнение скудного генофонда колонии...

traits.locale_text: Гостям предлагаются лучшие яства, какими может похвастаться колония. Архикоролева на искаженном за века изоляции низком готике славит гостей и называет Лорд-капитана любезн{mf|ым братом|ой сестрой}. В конце аудиенции гостям преподносят подарки. Министр Архикоролевы осторожно намекает, что лучшим ответным подарком было бы пополнение скудного генофонда колонии...

languages.text: The guests are served the finest delicacies the colony can provide. The Archqueen praises the visitors in mangled Low Gothic and calls the Lord Captain her dear {mf|brother|sister}. At the end of the audience, gifts are presented to the guests. The Archqueen's minister delicately remarks that the best possible gift the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew could provide would be the replenishment of the colony's meagre gene pool.
languages.original_text: Гостям предлагаются лучшие яства, какими может похвастаться колония. Архикоролева на искаженном за века изоляции низком готике славит гостей и называет Лорд-капитана любезн{mf|ым братом|ой сестрой}. В конце аудиенции гостям преподносят подарки. Министр Архикоролевы осторожно намекает, что лучшим ответным подарком было бы пополнение скудного генофонда колонии...

traits.locale_text: The guests are served the best delicacies the colony can provide. The Archqueen praises the visitors in mangled Low Gothic and calls the Lord Captain her dear {mf|brother|sister} and brings gifts at the end of the ceremony. The Archqueen's Minister hints that replenishing the colony's genepool would be the best way to thank Her Majesty back.

The guests are served the best delicacies the colony can provide. The Archqueen's Minister hints that replenishing the colony's genepool would be the best way to thank Her Majesty back.

The guests are served the best delicacies the colony can provide. The Archqueen praises the visitors in mangled Low Gothic and calls the Lord Captain her dear {mf|brother|sister} and brings gifts at the end of the ceremony. The Archqueen's Minister slyly hints that the best possible gift the Lord Captain and crew could offer would be the replenishment of the colony's meagre gene pool.

At the end of the audience, gifts are presented to the guests. The guests are served the finest delicacies the colony can provide. The Archqueen praises the visitors in mangled Low Gothic and calls the Lord Captain her dear {mf|brother|sister}. At the end of the audience, gifts are presented to the guests. The Archqueen's minister delicately remarks that the best possible gift the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew could provide would be the replenishment of the colony's meagre gene pool.

languages.text: 来访的客人们享受到了殖民地所能提供的最美味的菜肴。女皇用蹩脚的低哥特语赞美着客人们，并称领主舰长为她亲爱的{mf|兄弟|姐妹}。觐见结束后，所有来访的客人都收到了礼物。女皇的大臣委婉地表示，说舰长大人与{mf|他|她}的船员所能提供的最好礼物，就是想办法补充殖民地早已贫乏的基因库。
languages.original_text: The guests are served the finest delicacies the colony can provide. The Archqueen praises the visitors in mangled Low Gothic and calls the Lord Captain her dear {mf|brother|sister}. At the end of the audience, gifts are presented to the guests. The Archqueen's minister delicately remarks that the best possible gift the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew could provide would be the replenishment of the colony's meagre gene pool.

traits.locale_text: 来访的客人们享受到了殖民地所能提供的最美味的菜肴。女皇用蹩脚的低哥特语赞美着客人们，并称领主舰长为她亲爱的{mf|兄弟|姐妹}。觐见结束后，所有来访的客人都收到了礼物。女皇的大臣委婉地表示，说舰长大人与{mf|他|她}的船员所能提供的最好礼物，就是想办法补充殖民地早已贫乏的基因库。

languages.text: La colonia sirve sus mejores platos a los invitados. La archirreina alaba a los visitantes en un Bajo Gótico chapurreado y llama querid{mf|o|a} herman{mf|o|a} a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Al concluir la audiencia, se presentan unos regalos para los huéspedes. El ministro de la archirreina comenta con delicadeza que el mejor regalo que podrían ofrecer {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán y su tripulación es el reabastecimiento del limitado acervo genético de la colonia.
languages.original_text: The guests are served the finest delicacies the colony can provide. The Archqueen praises the visitors in mangled Low Gothic and calls the Lord Captain her dear {mf|brother|sister}. At the end of the audience, gifts are presented to the guests. The Archqueen's minister delicately remarks that the best possible gift the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew could provide would be the replenishment of the colony's meagre gene pool.

traits.locale_text: La colonia sirve sus mejores platos a los invitados. La archirreina alaba a los visitantes en un Bajo Gótico chapurreado y llama querid{mf|o|a} herman{mf|o|a} a{l| la} Lord Capitán. Al concluir la audiencia, se presentan unos regalos para los huéspedes. El ministro de la archirreina comenta con delicadeza que el mejor regalo que podrían ofrecer {el|la} Lord Capitán y su tripulación es el reabastecimiento del limitado acervo genético de la colonia.

languages.text: 客人にはコロニーが提供する最高級の料理が振る舞われる。アーチクイーンは下位帝国語（ロー・ゴシック）を駆使して客人を褒め称え、ロード・キャプテンを親愛なる{mf|兄弟|姉妹}と呼ぶ。謁見の最後には、招待客に贈り物が贈られる。アーチクイーン元首の大臣は、ロード・キャプテンと{mf|彼の|彼女の}クルーが提供できる最高の贈り物は、コロニーのわずかな遺伝子プールを補充することだろう、と微妙な発言をする。
languages.original_text: The guests are served the finest delicacies the colony can provide. The Archqueen praises the visitors in mangled Low Gothic and calls the Lord Captain her dear {mf|brother|sister}. At the end of the audience, gifts are presented to the guests. The Archqueen's minister delicately remarks that the best possible gift the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew could provide would be the replenishment of the colony's meagre gene pool.

traits.locale_text: 客人にはコロニーが提供する最高級の料理が振る舞われる。アーチクイーンは下位帝国語（ロー・ゴシック）を駆使して客人を褒め称え、ロード・キャプテンを親愛なる{mf|兄弟|姉妹}と呼ぶ。謁見の最後には、招待客に贈り物が贈られる。アーチクイーン元首の大臣は、ロード・キャプテンと{mf|彼の|彼女の}クルーが提供できる最高の贈り物は、コロニーのわずかな遺伝子プールを補充することだろう、と微妙な発言をする。

languages.text: Den Gästen werden die größten Köstlichkeiten serviert, die die Kolonie zu bieten hat. Die Erzkönigin preist die Besucher in gebrochenem Niedergotisch und nennt den Lord Captain {mf|ihren lieben Bruder|ihre liebe Schwester}. Am Ende der Audienz werden den Gästen Geschenke überreicht. Der Minister der Erzkönigin merkt höflich an, dass das bestmögliche Geschenk, dass der Lord Captain und seine Crew bieten könnten, die Erweiterung des sehr eingeschränkten Genpools der Kolonie wäre.
languages.original_text: The guests are served the finest delicacies the colony can provide. The Archqueen praises the visitors in mangled Low Gothic and calls the Lord Captain her dear {mf|brother|sister}. At the end of the audience, gifts are presented to the guests. The Archqueen's minister delicately remarks that the best possible gift the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew could provide would be the replenishment of the colony's meagre gene pool.

traits.locale_text: Den Gästen werden die größten Köstlichkeiten serviert, die die Kolonie zu bieten hat. Die Erzkönigin preist die Besucher in gebrochenem Niedergotisch und nennt den Lord Captain {mf|ihren lieben Bruder|ihre liebe Schwester}. Am Ende der Audienz werden den Gästen Geschenke überreicht. Der Minister der Erzkönigin merkt höflich an, dass das bestmögliche Gift, dass der Lord Captain und seine Crew bieten könnten, die Erweiterung des sehr eingeschränkten Genpools der Kolonie wäre.

languages.text: On sert aux invités les plats les plus délicats de la colonie. L'Archireine salue les visiteurs dans un bas gothique approximatif et appelle {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine {mf|son cher frère|sa chère sœur}. Au terme de l'audience, des cadeaux sont présentés aux invités. Le ministre de l'Archireine fait remarquer avec délicatesse que le meilleur cadeau que {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine et son équipage pourraient offrir serait leur participation au patrimoine génétique de la colonie.
languages.original_text: The guests are served the finest delicacies the colony can provide. The Archqueen praises the visitors in mangled Low Gothic and calls the Lord Captain her dear {mf|brother|sister}. At the end of the audience, gifts are presented to the guests. The Archqueen's minister delicately remarks that the best possible gift the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew could provide would be the replenishment of the colony's meagre gene pool.

traits.locale_text: On sert aux invités les plats les plus délicats de la colonie. L'Archireine salue les visiteurs dans un bas gothique approximatif et appelle {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine {mf|son cher frère|sa chère sœur}. Au terme de l'audience, des cadeaux sont présentés aux invités. Le ministre de l'Archireine fait remarquer avec délicatesse que le meilleur cadeau que {mf|le|la} seigneur-capitaine et son équipage pourraient offrir serait leur participation au patrimoine génétique de la colonie.

languages.text: Konuklara koloninin sunabileceği en iyi lezzetler ikram ediliyor. Arşikraliçe, bozuk bir Adi Gotik ile misafirlerini övüyor ve Lord Kaptan'a sevgili kardeşim şeklinde hitap ediyor. Ziyaretin sonunda konuklara hediyeler takdim ediliyor. Arşikraliçe'nin bakanı; Lord Kaptan ve mürettebatının verebileceği en iyi hediyenin, koloninin gen havuzunun yenilenmesi olacağını nazikçe ifade ediyor.
languages.original_text: The guests are served the finest delicacies the colony can provide. The Archqueen praises the visitors in mangled Low Gothic and calls the Lord Captain her dear {mf|brother|sister}. At the end of the audience, gifts are presented to the guests. The Archqueen's minister delicately remarks that the best possible gift the Lord Captain and {mf|his|her} crew could provide would be the replenishment of the colony's meagre gene pool.
